STEPS TO REPRODUCE:
 1. Enable layers acceleration.
    (Set layers.acceleration.force-enabled = true, restart Firefox,
     visit about:support & ensure that "GPU Accelerated Windows" says 1/1.)
 2. Open two tabs:
     http://www.mozilla.org/                  (or anywhere)
     http://www.rackspacecloud.com/index.php  (or testcase)
 3. Close the Rackspace tab
 4. Ctrl+Shift+T to restore Rackspace tab

ACTUAL RESULTS: Full content area briefly flashes to black (or to red in reduced testcase) while the tab loads.

EXPECTED RESULTS: No flashing.

Latest nightly w/ acceleration enabled gives ACTUAL RESULTS.
Latest nightly w/out acceleration (and Firefox 3.6) gives EXPECTED RESULTS.

NOTE: I sometimes see the bug on first load & on reload, too. It's just most visible on tab-restore.

Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:2.0b10pre) Gecko/20110121 Firefox/4.0b10pre
comments.creator: dholbert@mozilla.com
